Constructor & Destructor Documentation

GetAdditionalPOIInfo::GetAdditionalPOIInfo (  const char *  database,
const char *  host,
const char *  username,
const char *  password
) 
 

Create a new object of this class to get additional information from the SQL-database about the poi:s.

Will connect to the database that is specified as parameters. The constructor will make the necessary connections to the database, these are used by the other methods during the life time of the object.

Currently only handles connections to MySQL.

Parameters:
database The name of the database to use.
host The host where to connect to MySQL.
username Username when connecting to the database.
password Password when connection to the database.

virtual GetAdditionalPOIInfo::~GetAdditionalPOIInfo (   )  [virtual]

int GetAdditionalPOIInfo::addDynamicInfo (  uint32  dbID,
POIInfo &  info
)  [private]
 

Fetches and adds dynamic information to POIInfo for a specific POI Item.

Parameters:
dbID the database ID that the client wants information about
info information object to contain the dynamic information
Returns:
-1 on failure.

bool GetAdditionalPOIInfo::addPOIInfo (  ItemInfoData &  reply,
uint32  keyID,
const POIInfoDataFull &  info,
LangTypes::language_t  reqLang,
ItemInfoEnums::InfoTypeFilter  infoFilterLevel
)  const [private]
 

Add an info field to reply.

Parameters:
reply The item to add to.
keyID The key string.
info The information.
reqLang The prefered language.
infoFilterLevel The filter level to use when adding info
Returns:
True if the info is actually added

int GetAdditionalPOIInfo::addToPacket (  const GenericMap &  map,
const PointOfInterestItem *  item,
ItemInfoData &  reply,
LangTypes::language_t  lang,
const char *  addrString,
ItemInfoEnums::InfoTypeFilter  infoFilterLevel
) 
 

Adds information about a specific POI item to a packet.

Parameters:
map The map in which the POI item resides in.
item The POI item that information should be retreived for
reply The item to be filled in with information about the POI Item
lang Requested language of the information.
addrString An address string for the item.
infoFilterLevel The filter level to use when adding infos
Returns:
-1 on failure.

bool GetAdditionalPOIInfo::checkDatabaseConnection (  uint32  maxNbrTries = 1  )  [private]
 

Check if we have a valid connection to the database.

If not, the method will try to reconnect maxNbrTries times.

Parameters:
maxNbrTries The maximum number of times we will try to reconnect to the database before giving up.
Returns:
True if it is safe to use m_sqlConnection after this call. Something is seriously wrong if this method return false!

bool GetAdditionalPOIInfo::doQuery (  CharEncSQLQuery *  sqlQuery,
const char *  query,
const char *  whereTag
)  [private]

Gets ids which holds dynamic information.

Returns:
-1 on failure.

int GetAdditionalPOIInfo::getInfo (  const GenericMap &  map,
vector< Item * >::iterator  lower,
vector< Item * >::iterator  upper,

poiResultMap_t &  data

data Outparameter where the data is stored.
Returns:
The number of added pieces of data.

int GetAdditionalPOIInfo::getInfo (  uint32  sqlID,
resultMap_t &  data
) 
 

Get all additional information about one point ot interest.

Data will be added to the vector that is sent as parameter.

Parameters:
sqlID The primary key of the POI in the wasp-database.
data Outparameter where the data is stored. Added as key / value pair.
Returns:
True if a POI with the given sqlID was found, false otherwise.

const keyIDSet_t &  wantedTypes,
poiResultMap_t &  res
) 
 

Use this function to pre-cache data when you know what you want later.

Use with care since the cache is never emptied automatically.
